sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Material Handling Trolley for safe transportation of materials, equipment, and products within pharmaceutical manufacturing areas.
sections.scope: Applicable to material handling activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Inspect the trolley before use for cleanliness and structural integrity.
Check wheels or casters for smooth operation and proper locking mechanism.
Clean the trolley surfaces if required before loading materials.
Ensure the trolley is appropriate for the material being transported.
Load materials onto the trolley ensuring balanced distribution.
Do not exceed the maximum load capacity of the trolley.
Secure materials properly to prevent shifting or falling during transport.
For multiple items, stack carefully ensuring stability.
Use appropriate containers or trays for loose materials.
Verify that pathways are clear before moving the trolley.
Push the trolley using proper ergonomic technique.
Avoid sudden movements or sharp turns that may destabilize load.
Maintain clear visibility while moving the trolley.
Use designated routes and follow directional arrows in controlled areas.
Stop at doorways and intersections to check for cross traffic.
Use ramps or elevators for moving between different floors.
Upon reaching destination, engage wheel locks before unloading.
Unload materials carefully to prevent damage.
After use, clean the trolley and return to designated storage area.
Park trolley in designated area without blocking pathways.
Report any damage or malfunction immediately.
precautions: Do not exceed maximum load capacity of the trolley.
Ensure materials are properly secured before transport.
Maintain balanced load distribution to prevent tipping.
Keep pathways clear and watch for obstacles.
Use caution when moving through doors and tight spaces.
Engage wheel locks when loading, unloading, or parking.
Do not leave loaded trolleys unattended in production areas.
Use appropriate trolley type for specific materials (e.g., stainless steel for pharmaceutical use).
Follow cleanroom protocols when moving trolleys between areas.
Wear appropriate PPE including safety shoes.
